Gender.description: Gender of the patient. 1 represents male, and 2 represents female.

Age.description: Age of the patient in years.

Schooling.description: Years of schooling of the patient.

Breastfeeding.description: Indicates whether the patient was breastfed or not. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

value_dict.3: Unknown breastfeeding status of the patient.

Varicella.description: Indicates whether the patient has had Varicella (chickenpox). The specific coding scheme is not provided.

value_dict.2: The patient has not had Varicella.
value_dict.3: Unknown Varicella status of the patient.

Initial_Symptom.description: Initial symptom of the disease. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

Mono_or_Polysymptomatic.description: Indicates whether the patient presented with one symptom (mono) or multiple symptoms (poly). The specific coding scheme is not provided.

value_dict.1: The patient presented with one symptom.
value_dict.2: The patient presented with multiple symptoms.
value_dict.3: Unknown symptom status of the patient.

Oligoclonal_Bands.description: Indicates the presence of Oligoclonal Bands, a test for multiple sclerosis. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

LLSSEP.description: Lower Limb Somatosensory Evoked Potentials, a test for neurological conditions. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

value_dict.0: Lower Limb Somatosensory Evoked Potentials test was negative.
value_dict.1: Lower Limb Somatosensory Evoked Potentials test was positive.

ULSSEP.description: Upper Limb Somatosensory Evoked Potentials, a test for neurological conditions. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

value_dict.0: Upper Limb Somatosensory Evoked Potentials test was negative.
value_dict.1: Upper Limb Somatosensory Evoked Potentials test was positive.

VEP.description: Visual Evoked Potentials, a test for visual pathway abnormalities. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

value_dict.0: Visual Evoked Potentials test was negative.
value_dict.1: Visual Evoked Potentials test was positive.

BAEP.description: Brainstem Auditory Evoked Potential, a test for hearing and brainstem function. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

value_dict.0: Brainstem Auditory Evoked Potential test was negative.
value_dict.1: Brainstem Auditory Evoked Potential test was positive.

Periventricular_MRI.description: Periventricular Magnetic Resonance Imaging results. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

Cortical_MRI.description: Cortical Magnetic Resonance Imaging results. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

Infratentorial_MRI.description: Infratentorial Magnetic Resonance Imaging results. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

Spinal_Cord_MRI.description: Spinal Cord Magnetic Resonance Imaging results. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

value_dict.0: Spinal Cord MRI results were normal.
value_dict.1: Spinal Cord MRI results showed abnormalities.

Initial_EDSS.description: Initial Expanded Disability Status Scale score, a method of quantifying disability in multiple sclerosis. The score ranges from 0 (normal neurological exam) to 10 (death due to MS).

Final_EDSS.description: Final Expanded Disability Status Scale score.

group.description: Group assignment of the patient. The specific coding scheme is not provided.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the medical features of the patient, please predict the group the patient belongs to.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the medical features of the patient, please predict the final EDSS score.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the medical features of the patient, please predict the initial EDSS score.
